com.hybris.cis.api.executor

Interface ServiceMethodInterceptor<T,U extends Identifiable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiTenantServiceInterceptor

    public interface ServiceMethodInterceptor<T,U extends Identifiable>
    An interceptor that can be used to modify the request to and/or response from 3rd party services. T is the type of our generic request for this service call U is the type of our generic response for this service call

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void after(U response)
      Intercepts the response that was returned from a 3rd party service.
      void before(ServiceMethodRequest<T> request)
      Intercepts the request before it is send to a 3rd party service.

    • Method Detail

      • before

        void before(ServiceMethodRequest<T> request)
        Intercepts the request before it is send to a 3rd party service.
        Parameters:
        request - The request

      • after

        void after(U response)
        Intercepts the response that was returned from a 3rd party service.
        Parameters:
        response - The response
